name: Displacer Kitten
oracle_text: Avoidance — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, exile up to one target nonland permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Isn't she the cutest thing you've almost seen?"
—Doen, purveyor of exotic pets

name: Cone of Cold
oracle_text:
Roll a d20.
1-9 | Tap all creatures your opponents control.
10-19 | Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
20 | Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. Until your next turn, creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Ambition's Cost
oracle_text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Of course it can be yours. Anything is possible for the right price. Speaking of which . . ."

name: Arcane Encyclopedia
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Draw a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: A quill from the First Reader at Candlekeep, the spectacles of the Most Holy Servant of Gond, a woven bookmark from the Caleph Arcane of Calimport: readers always leave something of themselves behind.

name: Campfire
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}: You gain 2 life.
{2}, {T}: Exile Campfire: Put all commanders you own from the command zone and from your graveyard into your hand. Then shuffle your graveyard into your library.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Legion Loyalty
oracle_text: Creatures you control have myriad. (Whenever a creature with myriad attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Legion Loyalty
oracle_text: Creatures you control have myriad. (Whenever a creature with myriad attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: "Vrock!!"
oracle_text:
Flying
Toxic Spores — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, each opponent loses 3 life.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: "Ascent from Avernus"
oracle_text: Return all creature and planeswalker cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: "Call of the Void"
oracle_text: Each player secretly chooses a creature they control and a creature they don't control. Then all creatures chosen this way are revealed. Destroy those creatures.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: "Owlbear Cub"
oracle_text: "Here Comes Mama" — Whenever "Owlbear Cub" attacks a player who controls eight or more lands, look at the top eight cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that player. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in random order.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Renari, Merchant of Marvels
oracle_text:
You may cast Dragon seplls and artifact spells as though they had flash.
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Sure, you can get one elsewhere . . . if you want a knockoff that'll break the first time you use it."

name: "Ganax, Hunter of Stars"
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever "Ganax, Hunter of Stars" or another Dragon you contorl enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: "Street Urchin"
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "{1}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: "Gale's Redirection"
oracle_text:
Exile target spell, then roll a d20 and add that spell's mana value.
1-14 | You may cast the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
15+ | You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Sivriss, Nightmare Speaker
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: For each opponent, you mill a card, then return that card from your graveyard to your hand unless that player pays 3 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: "You're Banksy"
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls." (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Thrakkus the Butcher
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Thrakkus the Butcher attacks, double the power of each dragon you control until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Somehow he never seems to run out of meat.

name: "Minthara, Ruthless Soul"
oracle_text:
Ward {X}, where X is the number of experience counters you have.
At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you get an experience counter.
Creatures you control get +1/+0 for each experience counter you have.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: "Veteran Soldier"
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that that player, for each opponent, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking that player."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Dragon Cultist
oracle_text: Commander creatures you won have "At the beginning of your end step, if a source you controlled dealt 5 or more damage this turn, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: You know that mighty dracoliches will one day rule over this world. For you, that day can't come soon enough.

name: Descent into Avernus
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put two descent counter on Descent into Avernus. Then each player creates X Treasure tokens and Descent into Avernus deals X damage to them, where X is the number of descent counters on Descent into Avernus.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Raggadragga, Goreguts Boss
oracle_text:
Each creature you control with a mana ability gets +2/+2.
Whenever a creature you control with a mana ability attacks, untap it.
Whenever you cast a spell, if at least seven mana was spent to cast it, untap target creature. It gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn.

name: Alaundo the Seer
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand and put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value. It gains "When the last time counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste until end of turn." Then remove a time counter from each other card you own in exile.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

Equip {2}
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Some patriars pay massive sums for exotic pets that can give their posh, predictable lives an edge of danger.

oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if it was cast, exile it, then return all other permanent cards exiled with "Mirror of Life Trapping" to the battlefield under their owners' control.
